content: 0 stitches decreased 100 remaining 11 k4 p1 repeat to end 12 s​ ssk​ yo k1 p1 k1 yo k​ 3tog​ p1 repeat to end 2​ 0 stitches decreased 80 remaining 3 13 k3 p1 repeat to end 14 s​ ssk​ yo p1 yo k​ 3tog​ p1 repeat to end 2​ 0 stitches decreased 60 remaining 15 k2 p1 repeat to end 16 ssk p1 k2tog p1 repeat to end 2​ 0 stitches decreased 40 remaining 17 k1 p1 repeat to end 18 ssk repeat to end 2​ 0 stitches decreased 20 remaining 19 ssk k2tog repeat to end ​10 stitches decreased 10 remaining cut a tail of about 8 inches 20cm and thread through the remaining 10 stitches using a tapestry needle pull tight to close and secure the tail on the inside of the hat wet block to open up the lace enjoy body charted repeat the following chart four times total 4 crown charted work the chart below when finished work the following two row final decrease row 1 ssk repeat to end final decrease row 2 ssk k2tog repeat to end please send any pattern questions or concerns to ​crabbytabi ​on ravelry thanks 5
